page.title: 03INDUSTRIAL DEVELOPMENT
page.content: With the designation of the {Park Farm industrial estate n the outskirts of the town as an{ENTERPRISE}ZONE,new firms have started to move in.The most recent is the international firm GESTETNER.The company already employs more than 200 at another estate on the edge of the town.The 120000 square feet complex will mean new employment right across the range-assembly,clerical and research as well asmany non-skilled jobs.There will be new jobs for school leavers,graduates and even people in the fifties who have been hard-hit by the recession. A survey carried out by some sixth formers at the local{JOB CENTRE}found that many of the vacancies in the Wellingborough area would,be suitable for the many new firms,like GESTETNER, who are benefitting from local help.
